title: SSH connections dropping if I switch tabs
author: anomaly0617
body_snippet:
I'm running v1.77.2nb on Windows 11 Pro 21H2. After upgrading to 1.77.2nb on 2022-05-06, I noticed that if I have multiple SSH sessions open and I switch from one to another, and then back a minute or two later, the session will often have dropped to the first. 

<!--- Provide a general summary of the issue in the Title above -->

## Expected Behavior
SSH Sessions to persist unless something (like a network disconnection) occurs.
